rows.segment_description: The Family of Apps segment primarily generates revenue by selling advertising placements on its family of apps to marketers. These ads enable marketers to reach people across various marketing objectives such as generating leads or driving awareness. The segment focuses on helping people learn, get things done, create content, and connect with others through its apps.
rows.primary_source: SEC 10-K text snippet and revenue items

rows.segment_description: Reality Labs is a distinct segment reported separately from Family of Apps. While the text does not provide detailed product descriptions, it is implied that Reality Labs involves products related to AI glasses and web-based experiences designed to help people learn, get things done, create content, and connect with others.
rows.primary_source: SEC 10-K text snippet and revenue items
